name: Unknown Item
title: Shared Enemy Characteristics
overview: All enemies in the game share certain fundamental mechanics that affect their behavior and interactions with the tower.

heat_up_mechanic.description: Enemies gain 4% more damage per hit over time
heat_up_mechanic.effect: The longer an enemy survives, the more dangerous it becomes to the tower

coin_decay_mechanic.description: Enemies lose 50% of their coin value if they are alive for more than 3 waves
coin_decay_mechanic.effect: This mechanic encourages players to defeat enemies quickly to maximize coin rewards

enemy_mass_scaling.description: Enemy mass increases by 4% each wave they are alive
enemy_mass_scaling.effect: This affects various game mechanics that depend on enemy mass, such as knockback effects and certain ultimate weapon interactions

universal_enemy_properties: All enemies can be targeted by the tower's basic attacks
All enemies follow the same path toward the tower
All enemies have health, speed, and coin value properties
All enemies are affected by the heat-up, coin decay, and mass scaling mechanics
